title: 56 - Authenticity in Crypto | 1confirmation
description:
Nick Tomaino and Richard Chen are partners at 1confirmation, a crypto venture fund with $75M+ in assets under management (AUM).

In this episode, we explore the relationship between narratives and fundamentals in the space.
